name: Hostage Escape
description:
Reversed tower defense game with puzzle elements where you set up weapons to protect hostages during their escape.

PLEASE PLAY IN FULL SCREEN MODE FOR THE BEST EXPERIENCE

FIX INFO: DON'T USE F1 to RESTART use R instead.

Game includes 7 playable levels around 5-10 minutes of gameplay.

Drag weapons, aim and shoot enemies. Hold LEFT Mouse Button to MOVE weapon.

Hold RIGHT Mouse Button to MOVE weapon.

Be careful what you're shooting. Some objects can be dangerous.

Make sure that expected number of hostages can reach the target.
